g.text: asks to create a new request for an owned property
gives a list of possible agents and asks for the agent
shows list of types of property and asks the type of property
types the requested data [area in m^2, street, zip code and distance from city center]
shows list of states and asks to select one
shows list of districts and asks to select one
shows list of cities and asks to select one
types requested data [number of bedrooms, number of bathrooms, number of parking spaces,
asks for the existence of a basement
selects yes or no for the existence of a basement
asks for the existence of a loft
selects yes or no for the existence of a loft
asks for the direction of the sun exposure
selects the direction of the sun exposure [north, south, east, west]
asks for photos of the property
[Sends URI's one by one (from 1 up to 30 pictures)]
asks for the type of business
